name: Gardens (AlterLearning)
description:
"Gardens" is a 3D multiplayer game with two game modes.

In the game, players learn about green home gardening and global ecosystems.

In the real world, players can create rock sculptures and engage in a more open-ended sandbox game mode in Augmented Reality using their mobile android devices.

Players using mobile Android devices need to download the game to their device before AR functionality can be used.
